resources.string: The \"Audience Poll\" lifeline will survey the crowd and display what they think is the correct answer.
The \"50:50\" lifeline will remove two incorrect options.

You selected the wrong answer, so the game is over. Don\'t worry! Your cash prize score has been saved, but you can\'t continue the game. Click the \'Go Back\' button to return to the main screen. See if you can beat your score again!

Congratulations! Your wits and trivia savvy have earned you the million dollar grand prize! Click the \'Go Back\' button to return to the main screen, and challenge your friends to see if they can beat your score!

string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Who was the 6th president of the United States?
Which of the following is NOT one of the NEW 7 Wonders of the World?
Which of the following countries has NEVER won the World Cup?
